description: The main plaza on Fish-Man Island where the climactic battles of the Fish-Man Island Arc take place. Multiple Straw Hat Pirates members fight against New Fish-Man Pirates officers here.

keyEvents.title: Brook Defeats Zeo
keyEvents.description: Brook uses ice-based abilities to defeat Zeo at Gyoncorde Plaza.
keyEvents.significance: Part of the simultaneous victories by the Straw Hats over the New Fish-Man Pirates officers.

keyEvents.title: Usopp Defeats Daruma
keyEvents.description: Usopp uses Pop Green techniques to defeat Daruma at the plaza.

keyEvents.title: Chopper's Controlled Monster Point
keyEvents.description: Chopper reveals his mastered Monster Point form at Gyoncorde Plaza.

keyEvents.title: Chopper Defeats Dosun
keyEvents.description: Chopper defeats Dosun using his controlled Monster Point.
keyEvents.significance: Proves the effectiveness of Chopper's new form.

keyEvents.title: Franky Defeats Ikaros Much
keyEvents.description: Franky uses Franky Radical Beam to defeat Ikaros Much.

keyEvents.title: Jinbe and Sanji Defeat Wadatsumi
keyEvents.description: Jinbe and Sanji team up to defeat the giant Wadatsumi.
keyEvents.significance: Demonstrates coordination between Jinbe and the Straw Hats.

keyEvents.title: Zoro Defeats Hyouzou
keyEvents.description: Zoro easily defeats Fish-Man Island's best swordsman.
keyEvents.significance: Shows Zoro's overwhelming superiority after training with Mihawk.

statusHistory.reason: Main battlefield for the final confrontation

description: An enormous ship created during the Void Century, also known as the 'Ship of Promise.' It is almost half the size of Fish-Man Island itself and was built as part of an agreement with Joy Boy to use Poseidon's powers to raise it to the surface.

keyEvents.title: Hody Attacks Luffy on Noah
keyEvents.description: Hody Jones, empowered by Energy Steroids, savagely bites Luffy repeatedly on the Noah.
keyEvents.significance: Shows the intensity of the final battle on the ancient ship.

keyEvents.title: Luffy Defeats Hody with Elephant Gun
keyEvents.description: Luffy sends Hody crashing into Noah with his Elephant Gun attack.
keyEvents.significance: The decisive blow that defeats the main antagonist on the ancient ship.

keyEvents.title: Luffy Attacks Noah with Elephant Gatling
keyEvents.description: Luffy attempts to destroy Noah with Elephant Gatling to prevent it from destroying Fish-Man Island.
keyEvents.significance: Luffy damages the ancient ship to save the island, conflicting with the promise to Joy Boy.

statusHistory.reason: Heavily damaged by Luffy's Elephant Gatling attack while trying to stop it from destroying Fish-Man Island
